body.name: Hazifes Hollywood Vanity Mirror with Lights 9 LED,Tabletop Makeup Mirror with Smart Touch Control 3 Colors Dimable LED Bulbs Detachable 10X Magnification 360°Rotation White
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: ✅【Perfect Size】-The vanity mirror with lights size is 11.81" L x 12.72" H, allow you to get your entire face in view at once. Large enough to be used for table makeup, grooming and even dressing. 360 degree free rotation can be fixed in any position, providing a perfect perspective.

💡【3 Colors Lighting Modes& Ajustable Brightness】-The Hollywood-style vanity mirror with lights features 9 LED bulbs,offer warm and daylight settings and adjustable brightness.The vanity mirror with lights has 3 different settings, which ensures a clean, bright reflection, and a natural-looking makeup application as your need

👑【Smart Touch Control&Memory Function】- Our vanity mirror with lights touch sensor switch on the screen makes it easy to turn on/off the lights and adjust the brightness as you need. Memory function means the brightness will return to the previous brightness setting even after being turned off and turned back on.
🔍【Detachable 10X Magnifying Mirror】- Our light up makeup mirror has 10X magnifying mirror to help applying mascara, eyeliner, eyebrow and lipstick, creating flawless.

🎁【Great Ideal Gift】- HAZIFES makeup mirror with lights and magnification is the perfect gift for women for birthday, Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, Christmas or any other special occasion! Start a happy and beautiful day with HAZIFES makeup mirror.

🔧【No Installation Required】The vantiy mirror with lights made of strong high quality metal, come with a whole lighted miror doesn't require any complicated installation, all you do is plug the mirror in, and it’s start working with a beautifull day!
body.description: 9 LED Bulbs Vanity Mirror with Lights The hollywood makeup mirro is a Great Gift for makeup lovers, let's start with Hazifes makeup mirror in a happy and beautiful day! Hazifes Vanity Mirror with Lights have 3 color lighting modes, surrounded by 9pc LED bulbs with day light, cool light and warm light modesHazifes Lighted Makeup Mirror is very easy to control, with lights touch sensor switch on the screen makes it easy to turn on/off the lights and adjust the brightness as you need. Also the Memory function, which means the brightness will return to the previous brightness setting even after being turned off and turned back on. Packing included 1 mirror with bulbs 1 Adapter 1 user manual

Smart Touch Design Press the middle ones to turn on/ turn off the lightsPress "M" to change 3 color lighting modesHOLD "P" to adjust the LED bulbs brightness Strong Metal Frame & Durable LED bulbs The frame and base are made of strong metal with non-skip mat in the bottom, more stable and durable to use. Just enjoy the time when you makeup!The 9 bright LED bulbs, eye-friendly and can last for 50,000 hours lifespan. 360° Degrees Adjustable The Vanity mirror with lights could 360 degree rotation, could adjust the angle as you like whenever you makeup or a make dress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s worth the purchase. Packaging was nice. She perfect enough to sit on my desk without taking up too much space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my daughter for christmas because she is very into makeup and tiktok. She loves it and the lights have three setting and the mirror is touch screen. The size is perfect for table top and your whole face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10/10 PERFECT . Lighting changes colors . Love it
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my daughter room to put on her desk. It’s amazing. I want one for myself. The lighting has multiple options . You can click button and it changes the brightness . It looks so fancy and is very sturdy and high quality . While she has a much larger mirror on the wall behind her vanity this is the perfect tabletop addition . 10 out of 10 highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just works, big, and bright
reviews.reviewText: The Hazifes Hollywood Vanity Mirror with Lights has really improved my everyday makeup routine. This tabletop makeup mirror comes in a classy white design and has some cool features.With 12 LED lights, it makes it easy to put on makeup. You can change the brightness and pick from three different light colors, which is handy for different times of the day. Plus, it has a little mirror that you can take off and use for things like eyeliner or plucking eyebrows. And you can spin it around to find the best angle for your makeup.In a nutshell, the Hazifes Vanity Mirror is a great addition for anyone who likes doing makeup. It's got all the features you need to make getting ready a lot more fun and easy.

reviews.reviewText: Perfect make up mirror and I love the multiple settings! Nice it plugs in, my last one took batteries so I was always replacing them.
